annonstext:
Do you want to manage a team of skilled controllers and continue to improve our performance within the area of project control? If so, this position might be your next challenge!

Your role

You will be leading, driving and developing our department of Project Controllers on their path to strengthening the project performance, delivering results while developing the function and people to make them ready for the next step in Dynamics and Saab Finance Community.

Your skills and experience

To be able to work independently in this role, we expect you to have a number of years of experience in the finance area, preferably in a project-oriented organization. You are used to supporting the business in several areas and willing to walk an extra mile to get things done.

You may have experience from projects from the controlling perspective and you are used to working with stakeholders from various functions. Experience from leading others is positive.

You have good general knowledge of Finance and ERP systems and you are comfortable in the written and spoken English. Moreover, you are performance orientated, service minded and you always strive for quality and structure.

This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.

What you will be a part of

Dynamics is a business area within Saab that offers support weapons, missiles, torpedoes, sensors, unmanned underwater vehicles, camouflage systems and defense market training systems. The product portfolio also includes products for the civil security market, such as remote controlled underwater vessels for the oil industry and nuclear power plants.

You will be a part of the Dynamics finance function that are located at our main operations sites and reporting to the Business Area CFO. You will have direct reports located in Linköping and Karlskoga and certain travel will be necessary.

Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement. You can send us your application in either Swedish or English. 

If you are interested in what benefits you can take part of as an employee at Saab in Sweden, you can read more about them here

If you aspire to help create and innovate whilst developing yourself in a challenging team setting, Saab may well have the perfect conditions for you to grow. We pride ourselves on a nurturing environment, where everyone is different yet we share the same goal - to help protect people.

Read more about us here
